card.text: Spells your opponents control which target creatures you control and would cost less than four mana to cast costs four mana to cast. (For example, a spell that would cost {1}{B} to cast costs {3}{B} to cast instead.)

card.name: Aspect of Vigor
card.text: Creatures you control and creatures entering under your control this turn gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn. Elicit instant {2}{G} (You may cast this as an Instant instead of as an Instant Creature for {2}{G}, putting it into the graveyard as it resolves.) This creature enters with a +1/+1 counter for each other permanent you control with mana value 4 or greater.

card.name: Tune of Safeholding
card.text: You may return a blue creature and a white creature, or a blue and white creature you control to their owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. You draw two cards and gain 2 life.

card.name: Hemorrphage, Spritevix Queen
card.text: Flying, Lifelink You may discard cards and sacrifice creatures interchangeably. (For example. If a cost you pay would require you to sacrifice a creature, you may discard a card instead, and vice versa.)

card.name: Distill Fears
card.text: When this enchantment enters, exile the top four cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards. Discard a card or sacrifice a creature: Put target card exiled with this enchantment into its owner's hand.

card.name: Boorish Mystic
card.text: The first instant or sorcery spell you cast each turn that targets this creature costs {0}.

card.name: Antolie, Anomalous Apostate
card.text: Trample, Vigilance Nontoken creatures assign combat damage equal to their mana value instead of their power.

card.name: Augur of Soul
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 3 or greater, you gain 3 life. Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 5 or greater, create a 5/5 green Beast enchantment creature token. Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 7 or more, untap all permanents you control.

card.name: Spritethrombosix
card.text: Flying, Deathtouch Instant and sorcery spells you cast have "as an additional cost to casting this spell, you may sacrifice a creature." And "If a permanent was sacrificed to cast this spell, draw a card."

card.name: Sinister Magister
card.text: Whenever an instant or sorcery card is put into a graveyard, this creature deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Szyssixz, Feaster of Essence
card.text: Trample, first strike, menace Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets this creature, exile that spell, then copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy. When you do, return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Stroke of Avail
card.text: Reveal the top 5 cards of your library. you may put either each instant, land, or anomalous card revealed this way into your hand. Put the rest at the bottom of your library in a random order. (Anything with more than one card type is an anomaly.)

card.name: Scalemail Magmawhelk
card.text: Ward—{2}, pay 2 life. Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets this creature, put two +1/+1 counters on it. Then each opponent sacrifices an artifact.

card.name: Final Ember Embrace
card.text: Your life total becomes 2. Take an extra turn after this one. Exile Final Ember Embrace.

card.name: Mythos of the Archdemon
card.text: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. If {U}{B} Was spent to cast this spell, creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 and lose all abilities until end of turn.

card.name: Mindblaze Mystic
card.text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Firemind Richualist
card.text: Whiz — Whenever an instant or sorcery card is put into your graveyard, if it wasn't cast, create a treasure token.

card.name: Hyperbolt
card.text: This spell deals 6 damage to target creature. Whenever this spell deals excess damage, you may have it deal that much damage to any target.

card.name: Burning Apostle
card.text: Flying, Haste Whenever this creature attacks, add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}. This mana doesn't empty as steps and phases change, and can only be used on casting instant or sorcery spells.

card.name: Blazing Wheel-Kin
card.text: Each player discards their hand, then draws six cards. Elicit ‏Creature {3}{R} (You may cast this as a Creature instead of as a Sorcery Creature for {3}{R}, it resolves without the above effects.) Haste

card.name: Ominous Soul Tome
card.text: As long as it's not your turn, spells you cast have delve. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may have this artifact become a X/X skeleton artifact creature until your next end step, where X is that spell's mana value.

card.name: Chronoduplicate
card.text: Cast a copy of target creature you control without paying it's mana cost.

card.name: Mythos of the Sage
card.text: Draw ten cards, then put eight cards from your hand on the bottom of your library in a random order. If {W}{G} was spent to cast this spell, untap each permanent you control.

card.name: Retroarcane Continuity
card.text: The owner of target spell or permanent reveals their hand, then shuffles it and each spell, permanent, card in hand and/or graveyard with the same name as that spell or permanent into their library.

card.name: The Wind Releaser
card.text: At the beginning of each player's end step, exile target nonland permanent they control. For as long as that card remains exiled, its owner may cast it without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Narcorelapsy
card.text: Enchant creature When this aura enters, tap enchanted creature. It doesn't untap during its controllers untap step. At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you've cast three or more noncreature spells this turn, you may return this aura from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Unmoored Ideas
card.text: Each player mills three cards. Draw a card. Whenever a player casts a spell while Unmoored Ideas is a spell, draw a card.

card.name: Temporal Emergence
card.text: Emerge {4}{U}{U} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.) Take an extra turn after this one

card.text: Players can't spend more than X mana on casting a noncreature spell, where X is the highest mana value among permanents you control.
